Package ru.nubowski.timeTracker.service.impl

Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
ru.nubowski.timeTracker.service.impl.TaskService
@Service public class TaskService extends Object
Service for managing tasks.

      clockProvider - custom provider to get the current time
      taskRepository - repository for handling tasks
      timeLogRepository - repository for handling time logs

      Parameters:

    • stopTask

      public TimeLog stopTask(Task task)
      Stops a task and updates the corresponding time log.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to be stopped
      Returns:
      the updated time log
      Throws:
      OngoingTaskNotFoundException - if there is no ongoing task

    • resumeTask

      public TimeLog resumeTask(Task task)
      Resumes a task and creates a new time log. It is mostly for tag a task with USER_STOPPED and make a new one after PAUSE
      Parameters:
      task - the task to be resumed
      Returns:
      the created time log
      Throws:
      OngoingTaskNotFoundException - if there is no ongoing task

    • pauseTask

      public TimeLog pauseTask(Task task)
      Pauses a task and change its status to PAUSE. It is mostly for tag a task with PAUSED and not closed, so make a task not CLOSED
      Parameters:
      task - the task to be paused
      Returns:
      save the time log statement

    • updateTask

      public Task updateTask(Long id, TaskCreateRequest request)
      Find a task by ID and update its fields
      Parameters:
      request - DTO of the task from TaskCreateRequest with needed fields of view
      Returns:
      updated task

    • taskIsPresent

      public boolean taskIsPresent(Long id)
      Check if task is present.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the checked task
      Returns:
      TRUE if it is present and FALSE if not
